entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 19 except minus 14 near the Rockies.
entry.summary: Light snow. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19 except minus 14 near the Rockies. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
